website_summaries.verdict: An exceptional high-end stroller meant for joggers and other adventurers.
pros: Made by one of the top names in baby products
Included infant car seat installs easily using LATCH
cons: Can be cumbersome and awkward, especially when getting into or out of small cars

customer_reviews.title: The best lightweight and agile stroller!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE this stroller! It lives up to it's "agile" name. So easy to maneuver, even with 1 finger. Works great for our 11 mos old and even our tall 3.5 year old has used it at times too and still fits inside just fine. The 1 hand closure is simply MAGIC and it takes almost no room in the trunk! The canopy is nice and large and it even has a big peekaboo window. We added a universal parent console with 2 soft insulated cup holders and some pockets, which added the only missing detail. I can't imagine a more perfect stroller for 6mos to 4 year olds, and the price is great too!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I love this stroller
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller! We have been using ours for a few months and we have no regrets. It’s comfortable for our child, and it’s so easy to push. Our stroller has been on several flights, and we have used it in overseas travel. The black stroller is super easy to clean. Love love love!
customer_reviews.author: kgard

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller! Easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller! Easy to maneuver. One down fall is it doesn’t come with cup holders and anything extra. You can buy these extra accessories but it doesn’t come with.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: I really like the ease of opening and closing this stroller
customer_reviews.text: I really like the ease of opening and closing this stroller, the issues i'm having with it are after one winter it's really not easy to maneuver. the front wheel like to be stubborn now and it's pretty irritating. A feature I wish it had was a lowering sun shade for windy days to protect my son when from the wind blowing into his face.
customer_reviews.author: Kenners

customer_reviews.title: Best stroller ever
customer_reviews.text: Best stroller ever. If I had to name a jnegative it is getting used to the wheels in the back sticking out. However I would not change my purchas just because of that. It is easy to fold and unfold. It is compact in the car and easy for me to lift.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: smooth ride!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something that was similar to a jogging stroller but that a car seat could fit in - this is perfect! It's easy to maneuver, smooth ride for the baby, great cover in the sun... couldn't be more pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Great, well made stroller
customer_reviews.text: Great Britax product. We have a Britax car seat and wanted to buy a Britax stroller that we could just click it into. My husband and I have the bigger B-ready Britax stroller but this one is good for our car and is smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this product. Its really easy to fold, not that heavy to carry, the wheels are sturdy and large enough to make it easier to use around town on irregular terrain.
customer_reviews.author: bruce chow

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to assemble and is easy to collapse and store
customer_reviews.text: We got this to go with our Britax infant car seat. It was easy to assemble and is easy to collapse and store. Nice smooth ride and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together, fits perfectly with the Britax infant car seat we’ve bought (using the adapters) and the stroller turns/handles very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller for a great price. I do have to use both hands to fold it, but it's well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Pink Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller easy to fold up and put away
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller easy to fold up and put away. Have used stroller on various surfaces and rolls really well (gravel, grass)
customer_reviews.author: Haley Buff

customer_reviews.title: Love the stroller but the seat does not come up ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the stroller but the seat does not come up far enough for my son to reach the tray! It's always in a reclining position. Very frustrating!!
customer_reviews.author: Agnes

customer_reviews.title: Light weight love it
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, easy to use, works with infant car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Stroller
customer_reviews.text: This stroller glides so smoothly, and is so easy to handle. It folds up pretty small so if you have a smaller car then it will fit. The canopy has a lot of coverage too which is so nice. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany M

customer_reviews.title: Excelent choice
customer_reviews.text: O used to travel a lot and it’s perfect for everything
customer_reviews.author: Giselle de dios

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller for infants!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect light-weight stroller! I am easily able to click my sons car seat into the adapter and close and lift into my trunk as well. Plus it is sleek and pretty:)
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Adams

customer_reviews.title: Practical Stroller
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, easy to fold and unfold, smooth ride and my baby looks comfortable on it. On the downside, when folded doesn't stand by itself, tray and cupholder are not included, handlebar not adjustable
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Jeldes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like de stroller is very confortable, segured and beatifull. Gold Nice
customer_reviews.author: Isabela Carvalho Monteiro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very easy to operate, smooth and easy to make turns. good quality.
customer_reviews.author: han bo

customer_reviews.title: Great Stroller
customer_reviews.text: We have used this stroller for more than two months now and we do like it. It's easy to fold and to unfold, the canopy is very large so it protects well against sun, and also easy access to the bottom storage is great. Yet since I am very tall I do wish the push bar would be adjustable and some things like straps do seem cheaply made. But overall its great. I do like it.
customer_reviews.author: SF825

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this stroller
customer_reviews.text: Second Britix stroller I have purchased. Very satisfied with this stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis J Redecker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and fits into both of our tiny car trunks.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C.

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller. Good wheels
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller. Good wheels. Easy to fold. Not that easy to unfold with an 9 months old on your arm but still he can stand alone so not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Edi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it fits the b safe perfectly and the carseat adapters were included.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My wife is extremely pleased with this stroller. This strokler is for my third child so we have some good experience with strollers. The closing and opening functions are easy to use. The wheels are very easy to navigate with. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Seany Florida

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed. I do not understand how more kids are ...
customer_reviews.text: No footrest at all! My son's feet almost dangle to the ground. He can't even climb in and he slips down if I do not buckle immediately. Very uncomfortable. Customer service was a complete joke. So disappointed. I do not understand how more kids are not getting hurt on this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is awesome!!! Can't complain love everything about it!
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Seem sturdy,not that sturdy
customer_reviews.text: i lose my buckle during flights,so sad ,no more 5point harness for my little one.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller! The price is right and it handles like a dream. Easy to use :)
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller. Good wheels. Easy to fold. Not that easy to unfold with an 18 months old on your arm but still he can stand alone so not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kano

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the quality of this stroller. The canopy, while oversized, is cheap and noisy to open and close. The canopy is also awkwardly placed and it hits the top of my toddler’s head, when not open. The seat is super short, which makes the seat belt uncomfortably tight, between his legs/crotch. It also doesn’t sit up very straight, so my kiddo looks slouched and not comfortable at all. I really expected a higher quality of fabric at this price point. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Hazard: Fall/Injury Number Recalled: Over 700, 000 ...
customer_reviews.text: Hazard: Fall/Injury Number Recalled: Over 700,000 in North America Action to Take: Cease using stroller for travel, contact manufacturer for repair parts Contact: us.britax.com, 844-227-0300, Stroller.Recall@britax.com This stroller, which was sold at Target, Toys ‘R Us, and other large chains, has caused 26 recorded injuries due to a faulty attachment system, which causes the car seat to fall to the ground with the infant in it. While the car seat is still safe for use inside the car, consumers have been advised to stop using it with the stroller until requesting a repair kit.
customer_reviews.author: Yoko Naka

customer_reviews.title: One star deducted for plastic wheels, great otherwise!
customer_reviews.text: We picked up this stroller to replace the Babyjogger City Mini that broke. This is pretty comparable in drive, recline, and canopy. The storage basket on the bottom has only three sides making it easy to put the diaper bag underneath. The double canopy is great! The material wipes clean easy. The only things I like better in City Mini are the harness buckle and tires. The buckle on the Britax is hard to fasten and gets stuck easily. I wish the Britax tires weren't plastic, the rubber tires are more durable. The intructions were easy to follow and assembly took about 15mins or less.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Cusick

customer_reviews.title: Stroller maneuvers great!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this stroller attaches to the carseat. Granted you have to have the compatible carseat, but still - it makes the transition easier so we can go on walks with the family without waking the baby. The wheels on the stroller turn great without getting caught. Doesn't work for beach sand, but only jogging strollers work well for that. On the sidewalks and streets, this stroller is perfect and the wheels are easy to steer. Back wheel brake is easy to set and detach.
customer_reviews.author: ER

customer_reviews.title: Bad stroller don’t waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.text: I totally hated it, in less than 10 months the backrest went to an “u” and my baby is super uncomfortable, it doesn’t support the head and it’s also extremely heavy, horiible to fold and unfold PLUS the constantly recalls all the time, dangerous for your baby, don’t waste your money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cristbel Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: I've been really disappointed with this stroller. This was for my 3rd child so I have experience with strollers and was looking for an easy to put in the car stroller. It doesn't steer nicely, the seat doesn't go up enough for a toddler to sit upright and you can't put on of those bundle me's in the winter bc there isn't a back to wrap in over. Overall there are many other similar strollers and I would look into one of those.
customer_reviews.author: lovebuyingonamazon

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, Easy, Low on Storage
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stroller, it was passed down to me and is on it’s 3rd baby. It’s held up very well over the years. I like how lightweight it is, how easily it folds up and down, how well it neauverd, and how sturdy it feels. I do not care for how small the storage basket is. Maybe I just have a big diaper bag, but it doesn’t fit underneath. Also, no cup holders standard, but otherwise a great stroller!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly W.

customer_reviews.title: Good storage underneath and good large canopy
customer_reviews.text: It's ok for the price. I should have test drove one first. I would have gotten a different one. I find the handle length and height uncomfortable so I usually push with one arm standing slightly to the side. My husband also finds it uncomfortable. It's difficult to go up and down curbs as it has a tendency to tip. Good storage underneath and good large canopy.
customer_reviews.author: Spanky's mom

customer_reviews.title: I found that the maneuverability is not as easy as some other strollers I have tried
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with the travel infant carrier. I bought it because it was one of the safer strollers and lightweight. I found that the maneuverability is not as easy as some other strollers I have tried, such as the citi mini, and the wheels tend to get stuck/lock in to position. It is however very convenient to take in and out of the car and safely carried my child.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Anderson

customer_reviews.title: My husband and I love the ease of this stroller
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love the ease of this stroller, it's a very smooth ride. The basket space under is a great size and we don't have to worry about weight of a diaper bag tipping over the stroller (like our McClaren Quest) I especially love the easy closing function. We ordered the Cyan color which is a bit lighter in person, it's more of a baby blue color.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Poor handling
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed after only 3 months of use. Very hard to maneuver and constantly pulls to one side.
customer_reviews.author: Carolita

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stroller for my kid
customer_reviews.text: Amazing stroller for my kid, he loves so much one similar from his friend that we need to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Tiago Silva

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I love my stroller!! Ive had it since she was a newborn I used it with the car seat and it was great and easy to use. Now my daughter is 19 months I keep looking at smaller strollers but I end up just wanting to keep using this one. It's easy, light and my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Walkyria Garcia

customer_reviews.title: it's horrible to even at the mall so I end up ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this monitor for my baby 2 years ago from amazon. It's always been hard to pull and move but no that he's almost 30 pounds it's almost impossible! I tried to get a hold of Britex there's absolutely no way to get an answer! They claimed up to 45 pounds.. not even close as soon as he was sitting I couldn't walk around the block. always gets stuck and I have to actually pull it up on two wheels to turn it! it's horrible to even at the mall so I end up renting strollers. Very BAD Customer service I would not recommend this product you are better off carrying your baby instead off pushing this around everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Zizibay

customer_reviews.title: Nice all around stroller
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice three-wheeled stroller. There is a little assembly required, but it's essentially just putting the wheels, the canopy and the car seat attachments onto the stroller body. It arrives in a very large box and assembly only takes about 5-10 minutes. I'm no expert in strollers, but this seems to be built very well. The wheels spin nicely and turning it is very smooth​. The canopy folds down easily and the handle foam is very soft. I love how much storage is included beneath the buggy. It's easy to collapse and fold away when you need to store it and easy to transport when you need to go somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Calderone

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but recalls
customer_reviews.text: Nothing but recalls on Britax products. Very frustrating as a parent, can't trust the quality of these products and then have to wait months for replacement parts, the whole time knowing there is a problem with the product.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very light and moves smoothly. It is small to pack in your car.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Felipe Parra Pinzon

product_meta.title: Britax B-Agile Lightweight Stroller, Black | One Hand Fold + Easy to Maneuver + Large UV50+ Canopy
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Item Package Quantity:1The B Agile Stroller gives you the freedom to get where you need to go. The B Agile Stroller will not weigh you down thanks to its lightweight aluminum frame. Designed with multi tasking parents in mind, the 3 wheel configuration for smooth maneuverability and one hand quick fold make this Britax stroller easy to navigate and transport. This stroller provides an ultra small turning radius so you easily glide through tight spaces. The large expandable canopy with ventilation window provides protection for your child on sunny or rainy days, while near flat infinite recline keeps them comfortable on the go. Enjoy a safe ride with reflective harness straps to increase visibility in low light conditions and linked parking brake that locks both rear wheels with a single step. Travel system ready: simply click your child’s infant car seat into the stroller for a lighter, more convenient way to travel. The B Agile Stroller is compatible with all Britax and BOB infant car seats. Before heading out, store your baby gear in the large stroller storage basket and the additional zippered pocket. Fits children from birth to 55 pounds. Maximum unfolded stroller dimensions 38.5" L x 23" W x 40.5" H. Interior seat width 13.5”.
feature_bullets: Parent convenience: One-hand quick fold; Extra-large storage basket
Smooth ride: Lightweight design and all-wheel suspension for smooth, easy strolls
Check in & chat: Ventilated, UPF 50+ canopy with peek-a-boo window for checking on baby
Travel system ready: Compatible with Britax infant car seats
Relax & recline: Infinite recline for napping or seeing the world

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars113 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
